productVision: Mobile fitness tracking app that helps users log workouts, track nutrition, monitor progress with charts and goals, and connect with friends for motivation. Native iOS and Android apps with cloud sync.

backlogItems.title: User Onboarding and Profile Setup
backlogItems.userStory: As a new user, I want to create my profile with fitness goals, so that the app can personalize my experience
acceptanceCriteria: Create account with email or social login
Enter basic info (age, height, weight, gender)
Select fitness goals (weight loss, muscle gain, maintenance)

backlogItems.title: Workout Logging
backlogItems.userStory: As a user, I want to log my workouts with exercises and reps, so that I can track my training over time
acceptanceCriteria: Log sets, reps, and weight for strength exercises
Log duration and distance for cardio
Save workout with date and time

backlogItems.title: Nutrition Tracking
backlogItems.userStory: As a user, I want to log my meals and track calories, so that I can manage my diet alongside fitness

backlogItems.title: Progress Dashboard
backlogItems.userStory: As a user, I want to see my progress with charts and statistics, so that I stay motivated
acceptanceCriteria: Total workouts and active minutes stats

backlogItems.title: Social Features and Friends
backlogItems.userStory: As a user, I want to connect with friends and share progress, so that we can motivate each other
acceptanceCriteria: Find and add friends by username or email
Like and comment on friends' workouts

backlogItems.title: Workout Templates and Plans
backlogItems.userStory: As a user, I want to follow pre-built workout plans, so that I have structured training guidance
acceptanceCriteria: Browse workout plan library (beginner, intermediate, advanced)
